TopicTitle: Microphone can't pick up voice when engines are firing.

Articles.Content:
So I am a bit troubled, because I have videos to record and I have a microphone that can't pick up my voice. I'm using the Red Samurai Xbox360 headset, which works great in every area except for the title issue. I have tried turning down the spacecraft noise in the settings menu, and tried raising and lowering the entire game volume.

Thanks in advance for your replies.

I have no way of testing this, but here's an idea.

Go into the part.cfg files for the engines you're using. Look for this block.


// --- Sound FX definition ---

sound_vent_medium = engage
sound_rocket_hard = running
sound_vent_soft = disengage
sound_explosion_low = flameout

You can try commenting out the sounds by adding // in front of each line like so:


// --- Sound FX definition ---

// sound_vent_medium = engage
// sound_rocket_hard = running
// sound_vent_soft = disengage
// sound_explosion_low = flameout

When I do this, KSP will load the files just fine and the engines are silent. Hopefully that will allow your microphone to work.
